SEARCH
Package chocan.database

Class AbstractDatabase

java.lang.Object
chocan.database.AbstractDatabase
Direct Known Subclasses:
KeyValDatabase
public abstract class AbstractDatabase extends Object
This abstract class provides a template for creating database objects. It is not intended to be instantiated.
